title: A new and upgraded Bergen offers more
text:
A new and upgraded Bergen offers more A new and upgraded Bergen offers more Details Created   16:30 In 2017 the city will be able to offer over 7,500 hotel rooms and 13,500 beds New hotels and a tremendous number of upgraded hotels and venues will give Bergen a huge lift making it more attractive for events and meetings of any size. New Hotels Clarion Collection Hotel Oleana This unique and boutique hotel with 98 rooms opened June 2015. The hotel is central located in the streets of the theatres and many bars and restaurants in Bergen nad is a perfect option for incentive groups. 
Scandic Ørnen - opened 2014 Scandic Ørnen opened last year and is the largest hotel and one of the tallest buildings in the city centre of Bergen. The hotel is a total of 19 000m2 and has 368 top modern hotel rooms. 16 meeting rooms where the largest one can fit up to 400 delegates can offer top modern conference facilities. The city’s only sky bar is in the 13th floor, and here you can enjoy a fantastic view over Bergen city. Scandic Flesland - opens 2017 The Scandic hotel opening in April 2017 is a big business and conference hotel right nearby the new airport terminal on Flesland. The hotel will, as per today, have 300 rooms, 25 meeting rooms and a conference hall of up to 1000 square meters. Comfort Flesland Nordic Choice is opening its' 3rd airport hotel with 300 rooms. The hotel will mainly have rooms, but can offer large meeting facilties for up to 650 people in the nearby conference hotel - Clarion Hotel Bergen Airport. Renovated hotels Quality Hotel Edvard Grieg - re-opened May 2015 Western Norway`s largest conference hotel will re-open May 1st this year. Their expansion includes an increase in general capacity as well as rooms. A total of 220 new rooms will be provided, which will result in a total of 373 available rooms. 153 of them will be junior suites with 35 handicap friendly rooms. There is also a renewing of the conference area with 20 rooms divided on 2 floors also a new conference hall of 1000m2 with a capacity of 1 100 delegates. Thon Hotel Bergen Airport - total renovation The hotel has recently conducted an extensive renovation. Restaurant Lindbergh has become larger and appears in modern costume. The lobby, reception and other public areas have become colorful and inviting with interesting details. Their meeting rooms have also received a boost, with rectified air quality, excellent lighting and great break areas with a total capacity of delegates up to 250. Clarion Hotel Admiral - partially renovated November last year, Clarion Hotel Admiral renovated their entire hotel and added a number of 10 new rooms. 104 of the 210 existing rooms at the hotel where renewed as well as all the corridors. In addition, they also have a new restaurant, Kitchen & Table, in cooperation with Samuel Jackson’s Manhattan and Sweden inspired concept ”fun dining” as opposed to fine dining. The contractors have had a major focus on energy saving measures, and it has been done changes that can result in this. Scandic Neptun - 70 new rooms After the expansion in 2014, Scandic Neptun has been upgraded with 70 new rooms, which results in 270 available rooms. The hotel can also offer the three restaurants; Lucullus, Pascal food and wine and Entre as well as the hotel bar Ludvig Wine and Champangebar. Related articles
